original_text: I have seen that the Egyptians are being cruel to my people. My people are crying with pain and I have heard them. Now I have come down to save them. So come here and listen to me. I will send you back to Egypt.” ’
korean_text: 내 백성이 애굽에서 괴로움 받음을 내가 확실히 보고 그 탄식하는 소리를 듣고 그들을 구원하려고 내려왔노니 이제 내가 너를 애굽으로 보내리라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: I have seen that the Egyptians are being cruel
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 이집트 사람들이 잔인하게 행하고 있음을 보았다

sentences.original_text: My people are crying with pain
Now I have come down to save them
So come here and listen to me
sentences.korean_translation: 그러니 이리 와서 나의 말을 들어라

sentences.original_text: I will send you back to Egypt
